DOC.HEADLINE: ' 94 WINTER_OLYMPICS / LILLEHAMMER ; NOTEBOOK
DOC.TEXT: Now , here ' s a cause you can get_behind : Some U.S. mogul skiers wore gold armbands during the finals , protesting that freestyle ballet has not been made an Olympic sport . " It is a shame that some of the world ' s best athletes are not_able to compete in the Olympics , " said Liz McIntyre , the silver-medal winner in moguls . But McIntyre was not among the skiers wearing an armband . " I didn ' t wear mine , frankly , because I forgot , " she said . * Add McIntyre : Her parents came_to Lillehammer to watch her in the Olympics . McIntyre , who grew_up in New Hampshire but now lives_in Winter Park , Colo. , said her mother loves Norway . " My mother raises sheep , " she said . " She weaves and knits . She ' s excited to be in Norway with all_the wool and buttons. " CHRIS DUFRESNE
